attributes.additional_details:
e-petitions are meaningless,unrepresentative, technically flawed, bogus nonsense that allow underoccupied busybodies to hector the working majority with their fatuous,death-obsessed agendas.They are the last desperate bid of a failed state to cling to a pretecnce of democracy.They should be abolished.

Persistent e-petitioners should be burnt at the stake or fried in boiling oil - according to the results of an online poll of the defendants' character.
